objects.text: Premium Protection • Polarized Lenses • UV Protective • Iconic Design
Be an Early Bird, Reap Big Rewards!

product_details.name: Classic Ray-Ban New Wayfarer - Timeless Style Meets Premium Protection
product_details.description:
• Authentic Ray-Ban polarized sunglasses with signature design
• Premium black glossy acetate frame construction
• Dark tinted UV-protective lenses for optimal sun protection
• Iconic silver Ray-Ban logo on temple
• Comfortable and lightweight wear for all-day use
• Universal fit suitable for most face shapes
• Includes original Ray-Ban case and cleaning cloth
• 100% UV protection against harmful rays
• Durable high-quality hinges for long-lasting performance
• Classic wayfarer style that never goes out of fashion

banner_details:
The banner features a modern promotional layout designed to showcase a featured sunglasses product. The backdrop uses a sleek radial gradient spotlight effect overlaid with fractal noise and subtle golden waves for a luxurious feel. The topmost text layer labeled `tagline` promotes a limited-time offer in bold, uppercase typography with a gold color (#D4AF37). Below that, the `heading` and `subheading` layers inform about the product model and its value proposition in coordinated white and gold text. Centered prominently is the `product_image`, featuring black sunglasses. Supporting this, the `description` text lists key features in a single line. The `tagline_2` adds a call-to-action encouragement just above the pricing. The `price` is highlighted in large gold font, making it eye-catching. At the bottom, the `cta_button` and associated `cta` text form a well-placed purchase prompt.

**Color Palette:**
- Black: #000000
- Very dark gray: #1A1A1A - #333333 (gradient)
- Gold: #D4AF37
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a classic pair of black Ray-Ban sunglasses, where the dominant color is deep black (#000000), exuding elegance and sophistication. The glossy black frame and dark polarized lenses are subtly accented by hints of metallic silver (#C0C0C0) around the hinge rivets and brand logo, adding refinement. The logo in white (#FFFFFF) on the lens and side enhances visibility and brand recognition. The blending of the high-gloss black and reflective surfaces creates a sleek modern look, while the monochromatic palette keeps it stylish and minimal. Suggested advertisement colors: Black (#000000), Silver (#C0C0C0), White (#FFFFFF), Charcoal Gray (#2C2C2C).
